title: Electric Commercial Food Warmer for Parties Buffets with 4 Pot Stainless Steel Steam Table, Temperature Control Buffet Server for Catering and Restaurant …
features: 【Premium Material】: This food warmer is made of high quality 201 stainless steel, which is rust and corrosion resistant and has a long service life. The removable pan and smooth stainless steel make cleaning a breeze. You can wash it directly with water without taking too much time.

【Constant Temperature Control】: It has a precise thermostat, which automatically heats when the food temperature is lower than the set temperature, and stops when it reaches the set temperature. It has a temperature control knob with a range of 30-85°C in 5°C increments, so you can control the temperature more precisely as needed.

【Energy Saving and High Efficiency】: This food heater adopts a double-walled body and a fully enclosed design, which isolates the external air from the internal heat flow, reduces frequent heating, and is more energy efficient. This food heater has a thickened multi-circuit heater with a large heating area and an even heating area. It provides rapid energy concentration for efficient and rapid heating.
【Large Capacity】: This food warmer comes with two 7.4Qt pans and two 3.2Qt pans, allowing you to serve a large number of four different dishes at the same time.

[Copper drain valve]: Equipped with a drain valve, the sewage after cleaning the pot can be easily and efficiently discharged, which is very convenient and labor-saving. The drain valve is constructed of corrosion-resistant, rust-free copper for extended service life.
description: This is a commercial food warmer. This food warmer is made of high-quality 201 stainless steel,  which is very sturdy and durable, ensuring a long service life. Its temperature can be freely adjusted from 30 to 85 degrees Celsius to meet your different heating needs. It maintains the taste of the food well, which will significantly increase the return rate of your guests. It will be the ideal choice for you.
Please allow the slight color difference caused by the shooting light and 1-3cm error due to manual measurement, and make sure you do not mind before ordering.
